name: HELLION Prototype
description:
Fight through endless hordes of enemies in this endless, 2D arena-shooter. Encounter a variety of difficult bosses, and get points to upgrade your weapon firerate.

This is a prototype - it's not particularly pretty, and is very rough around the edges. Please give feedback, especially on gameplay!

The plan is to eventually develop it into a full roguelike experience where you battle through 9 circles of hell.
